review: Dr. Anil Arora is a really good doctor and takes very good care of the patient. He is able to explain the problem of the patient to even a layman and always gives ample time to patient. The Clinic is very well maintained and the staff is also very co-operative. Dr. Anil Arora is expert in his area of Orthopaedics. He ensures that patient understands the treatment plan. He is very good at communicating the exact problems and how he plans to cure the patient. Most importantly he seemed more worried about curing the patient rather than only focusing on money. He never suggests any costly tests or medicines until and unless it is necessary for the patient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A genuine gentleman is what would summarize Dr. Arora.
He didnt ask me get any extra x ray done either and said that your July x ray is sufficient as he could decipher based upon my leg movement that the previous x ray is sufficient and a new one is not required.
Every doctor i have seen till date asks to get x ray done from their facility and definitely earn some profit.
Where my hip join would eventually require a replacement however he said that we cant do surgery purely on our guess that it might require surgery 3-4 or may be 10 years later. Who knows - a surgery might never be required.
The world we are living in - doctors advice expensive surgery wherever there is an opportunity.
Here i was mentally prepared for a surgery but Dr. Arora denied it and prescribed only medicines.

God bless you sir.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Medical guidance stands on pillars of trust and faith. Strong medicines in form of steroids without the consent of the patient resulted in serious complications which were not even backed by any responsibility.
There is problem with apointment. Date is given for 7 to 10days for reconsultation which is too long.

It was great experience with Dr. Anil Arora at Max Hospital Patparganj. He is the best knee Replacement Surgeon. My mother had severe pain on both the knee due to arthritis and we came to know about Dr. Anil Arora, we came here, he observe my mother's knee, advised for surgery and Dr. Arora did the surgery. Surgery was successful. now we entire family member are very happy with the result and Dr. Anil Arora and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Anil Arora, after consulting many doctors for my mother. He seems in no hurry to reach to a conclusion. He listen patiently, asked many specific questions to find the real reason for such pain. Amazing consulting and advisory skills that he has. 

In just one visit, we can see a significant improvement in my mother's pain. 

He is a wonderful doctor.

The entire experience was just incredible, after suffering with arthritis in both knees for more then 10 years, My uncle was pain free. My uncle was afraid for the replacement surgery because of all the things he hear about when people have complications after surgery. My uncle had bi-lateral knee replacement in last March and after some hard rehab he was able to playing football match with my team in May end.! I can`t say enough good things about Dr. Anil Arora and his team, who did an outstanding job . The entire staff is just great! Most of the time my uncle forget  even have knee replacements. My advice to anyone considering knee surgery is to approach it with an open mind and great determination to recover quickly. Thank you all.
1 month ago I meet with an accident where my rigth knee is damaged.We get this information through MRI report . He also said for Operation.

My mother was in severe pain in left hip and she had great difficulty in doing daily chores. We went to couple of doctors for her treatment but no one is ready to operate or take her case because of her over weight(120). Then we came to know about Dr. Prof. Anil Arora from few of his successfully operated patients. Then we went to his website and found him highly qualified, highly experienced so, we went to visit him at his clinic at Hargobind Enclave, East Delhi. He did the examination of my mother's Hip. With in a week Total Hip Replacement was carried out and everything goes so smoothly.
It has been six months now, she is doing well and walks every day 4-5 Km.
I strongly recommend Dr. Arora, an honest, trustworthy, knowledgeable and skilled Doctor. He is the best Joint Replacement Surgeon in Delhi-NCR.
It was great experience with Dr (Prof) Anil Arora. He is the best Joint Replacement surgeon in Delhi NCR.
